comment: If ` Y ` is a multiple of ` _pi ` then it belongs to an open inerval ` ( A (,) B ) ` such that for any other point ` y ` in the interval, cos y/2 and sin y/2 are nonzero. Such an interval is needed to apply De L'Hopital theorem. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
